text.content: Carlos just got a job at the corner shop.
It was called Tienda La Esperanza.
It was a short walk from his house.
Today was his first day at work.
He felt nervous but also excited.
He arrived early in his uniform.
He wanted to make a good impression.
His first task was to set up the store.
He had to organize the shelves.
He also had to clean the counter.
His manager showed him how to use the cashier.
His coworkers helped him feel comfortable.
Carlos handed change to customers and bagged their items.
By the end of the day, he was tired but happy.
